text: Pedro Aparecido Santana, better known as Pedrinho, is a retired Brazilian football player. He was born in São Paulo, Brazil. ==Club career== Pedrinho starting playing for Edessaikos in the Greek second division in 1997. He played for 3 other clubs before retiring after he was released by Honduran club, F.C. Motagua. ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile at Globo Esporte's Futpedia *Motagua profile Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Association football forwards Category:Footballers from São Paulo
title: Pedrinho (footballer, born 1973)
